subject: Basketball
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: Playing Besiktas Milangaz, a Turkish basketball team, during the lockout, Deron Williams of the Nets encountered rough play in a loss in Belgium. He scored 7 points.
snippet: Playing Besiktas Milangaz, a Turkish basketball team, during the lockout, Deron Williams of the Nets encountered rough play in a loss in Belgium. He scored 7 points.
